radiographic_examinations.findings: Hypodense oval-shaped lesion localized in the superomedial quadrant of the orbit.
Solid, round infiltrative extraconal mass in the superomedial orbit, irregularly enhancing.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Further recurrence reported after several anterior orbitotomies.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Enlargement of the right inferior rectus with irregular extension into the intraconal fat.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No evidence of recurrence at last follow-up 2.5 years later.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Mass in the superomedial orbit, patchy enhancement post-contrast.
Lobulated, well-circumscribed retrobulbar mass with marked contrast enhancement.
